extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization part of the Energy Sector or other Critical Infrastructure?

extracted_playbook.title: Harden IT/Corporate Network
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce the risk of initial compromise by hardening the IT/corporate network.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Software and Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update all software, including operating systems, applications, and firmware, in a timely manner. Consider using a centralized patch management system.

extracted_playbook.title: Replace End-of-Life Software and Hardware
extracted_playbook.description: Replace all end-of-life software and hardware devices to ensure security and support.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict and Manage Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict and manage remote access software. Require multi-factor authentication (MFA) for remote access.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Unauthorized Execution Prevention
extracted_playbook.description: Disable macro scripts from Microsoft Office files transmitted via email and implement application allowlisting.

extracted_playbook.title: Filter Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Prohibit ingress and egress communications with known malicious IP addresses. Implement URL blocklists and/or allow lists.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Antivirus/Antimalware Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly scan IT network assets using up-to-date signatures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Robust Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure robust network segmentation between IT and ICS networks to limit lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Monitoring
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor network at key chokepoints and configure IDS to create alarms for any ICS traffic outside normal operations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement ICS Environment Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Update all software, implement application allowlisting on HMIs, harden field devices, and disable unused ports and services on ICS devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Data Backup Procedures
extracted_playbook.description: Implement regular, frequent data backup procedures on both the IT and ICS networks. Ensure backups are regularly tested and stored separately.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain ICS Asset Inventory
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain an inventory of all hardware, software, and supporting infrastructure technologies in the ICS environment.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Robust Physical Security
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure robust physical security to prevent unauthorized access to controlled spaces housing ICS equipment.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement User Training Program
extracted_playbook.description: Train employees to recognize spearphishing attempts and reinforce appropriate user response to spearphishing emails.
